title: It Always Ends The Same 0
content:

[[include :scp-wiki:theme:extra-black-highlighter-theme]]

[[=image tv.PNG]]

= It always ends the same.

> [[[scp-5733 | "Hey you there, I don't know you, and I don't know why you've just sat there watching this without doing nothing but please, I'm begging you, help me out here. What can I do to survive this?"]]]

You stare at the television screen. She doesn't know you, but you know her. You told yourself last time would be the **last** time, yet you're here again.

You've seen this film before. So many times. It invades her house. Kills her friends. Chases her into the basement, and that's where she sees **you**. Her last hope. Last chance of survival. Yet it always ends the same.

You agonise internally over what to recommend this time. An idea sparks. You open your mouth to speak:

[[table style="border-collapse:collapse; width: 100%;"]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="font-weight:bold;padding: 1.0em 1.0em; text-align: center; border: 8px solid #141618; background-color: #a3a1a6; width: 50%;"]]
[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/it-always-ends-the-same/offset/1 |Tell her to run through the woods behind her house to escape.]]]
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="font-weight:bold;padding: 1.0em 1.0em; text-align: center; border: 8px solid #141618; background-color: #a3a1a6; width: 50%;"]]
[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/it-always-ends-the-same/offset/2|Tell her to go hide in the neighbour's house across the road.]]]
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]
author: Dysadron
